summary: Determined junior web developer specialized in Symfony and React. Former military, demonstrating rigor and adaptability in all my missions. Curious and passionate, I strive to continuously learn and improve to achieve my goals.

responsibilities: Development of a web portal with design and templating.
Design of an AI and SEO generation module using REST API.
Adapting an existing system into a resource model for a blog.
Design and integration of a language detection module.

responsibilities: Team management and coordination for support missions.
Development of group management and leadership skills.
